name: React
description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces. It is used to build single-page applications. Also, it allows us to create reusable UI components.

name: JavaScript
description: JavaScript is the world's most popular programming language. It is the programming language of the Web. And, it is easy to learn.

name: CSS
description: CSS is the language we use to style an HTML document. It describes how HTML elements should be displayed.
